  Output: html_document

```{r label, options}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
rm(list=ls())

library(magrittr)

combinat::permn(c(0,1,2,3)) %>%
  unique %T>%
  {set.seed(20190111)} %>%
  sample(
    size = 500,
    replace = T
  ) %>% unlist %>% paste(collapse = " ") %>%
  writeLines(
    "BlockRandomisation.txt",sep=""
    )

```
